property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object name
property.description: API Name of the target object.

property.name: filterName
property.label: Filter name
property.description: Name of the list view filter.

property.name: pageSize
property.label: Page size
property.description: Number of items to display per page.

property.name: labelColumn
property.label: Label field
property.description: API name of the field used for label; leave blank otherwise.

property.name: titleColumn
property.label: Title field
property.description: API name of the field used for title.

property.name: dateColumn
property.label: Date field
property.description: API name of the field used for date.

property.name: tagsColumn
property.label: Tags field
property.description: API name of the field used for tags (which must be picklist style, i.e. separated by semi-colons).

property.name: imageColumn
property.label: Image field
property.description: API name of the field used for image.

property.name: imageAltColumn
property.label: Image alt field
property.description: API name of the field used for image alt.

property.name: titleClassName
property.label: Title CSS class name
property.description: CSS class to be used for the list view title.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
